In such a tough time, doctor came to my rescue in getting my dad admitted. It was such a relief to receive his phone call at an urgent moment, when I saw myself so helpless to see my dad‚Äôs health condition and when there was such non availability of ICU bed.  He not only helped my father get admitted but also treated him successfully. He was very proactive in putting my father on the right treatment and kept counselling me on his treatment. He truly leads by example of an exceptional doctor üë®‚Äç‚öïÔ∏è He truly is an angel who saved my father‚Äôs life when I was almost on the verge of losing all hopes.  What distinguishes him as an outstanding doctor, is his proactive ness,  his coordination, timely monitoring, strong conviction and commitment in his treatment, courage and his confidence.  I highly recommend him üëè

review: I visited Dr. Samar for my mother when she was having weakness and cough. He talks to the patient and tries to extract the exact health issue being faced, discusses and suggests clearly the treatment and cure. I visited Dr. Samar twice and was very satisfying. He is very comfortable talking and gets the anxiety and worries away. Not only at the clinic, he also was explaining the reports and cleared all our doubts on WhatsApp as well. We also get a call from the clinic, if the patient is doing fine. Overall, it was a very pleasant experience. I would recommend Dr. Samar to everyone who wants to have good treatment with comfortable, friendly, and clear conversation.
